meanings.definition: A type of millstone used for grinding grains.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used buhrstones to grind wheat into flour.
meanings.sent2: The buhrstones at the mill were worn smooth from years of use.
meanings.sent3: The buhrstones had a race to see who could grind the most grains in a day.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like buhrstones, grinding away at the obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the buhrstones turning echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: The material from which millstones are made, typically a hard siliceous rock.
meanings.sent1: The quarry provided the perfect buhrstones for the mill.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the buhrstones as a type of quartzite.
meanings.sent3: The buhrstones were so tough, they could break even the strongest tools.
meanings.sent4: The buhrstones gleamed in the sunlight, a testament to their hardness.
meanings.sent5: The ancient buhrstones were believed to have magical properties by the villagers.
